name: CloudGPU
description: cGPU is a decentralized platform that connects GPU providers with users seeking high-performance computational power. The project facilitates on-demand GPU rental through a user-friendly interface, offering one-click deployment and pre-configured templates for AI, machine learning, and data analytics tasks. cGPU aims to make GPU resources more accessible and affordable for a wide range of applications. The platform's roadmap includes plans to transition to a custom Layer 1 blockchain, which is intended to eliminate transaction taxes and improve efficiency. cGPU is also focusing on expanding its ecosystem through strategic partnerships and continuous development of its infrastructure.
